Articles.Content: I want to launch my colony ship, but don't want to make a massive mission where I dock multiple pieces(I don't know how to rendezvous). Can KK be used to make orbital launch sites? or do I have to use something like Extraplanetary launch pads?

I don't know the answer to your question. However, I would like to suggest another way.

Build your craft so they can be placed on the launchpad with launch clamps holding them in place, and then use the cheat debug menu to "rendezvous" them with whatever you're building in orbit. They will instantly teleport near it and you can then dock them and repeat the process with the next craft.
